name: Massachusetts
notes: Early voting in person only applicable to the general election.

name: New Mexico
notes: Seems to indicate you can in-person absentee vote? http://www.sos.state.nm.us/Voter_Information/Absentee_and_Early_Voting.aspx

name: New York
notes: In-person absentee voting is with an excuse only.

name: North Dakota
notes: Fun fact: North Dakota is the only state without voter registration. It is also worth noting that North Dakota law still provides cities with the ability to register voters for city elections. In order to vote you need to be (1) At least 18 years old on or before Election Day, (2) A North Dakota resident, (3) A resident of your voter precinct for at least 30 days prior to the election.

name: Pennsylvania
notes: In-person absentee voting is with an excuse only.

name: West Virginia
notes: Automatic VR not in effect yet: https://www.wvgazettemail.com/news/politics/voter-id-law-to-take-effect-in-wv-jan/article_e1a9d09b-258a-5271-9482-cf7a7c5ce70f.html
